@cheznico_ That's how upgrades work. Monero, Ethereum and many other high profile coins have forkes numerous times. BTC had also forked twice.  "Forks on forks" comment makes no sense. Soft forks build on the previous fork, hard forks cleanly upgrade without technical debt.
